name: hotshare-static-web-js-bundles
description: js code for the static page with NPM builder

scripts.build: browserify -t [ coffeeify --bare false --header true ] --extension=".coffee" post-main.js | uglifyjs -p 10 -c -m > bundle-post-$npm_package_postVersion.min.js && browserify -t [ coffeeify --bare false --header true ] --extension=".coffee" social-main.js | uglifyjs -p 10 -c -m > bundle-social-$npm_package_socialVersion.min.js && cp bundle*.js ../hotShareWeb/public/statics/ && rm bundle*.js
scripts.build-debug: browserify -t [ coffeeify --bare false --header true ] --extension=".coffee" post-main.js -o bundle-post.js && browserify -t [ coffeeify --bare false --header true ] --extension=".coffee" social-main.js -o bundle-social.js && cp bundle*.js ../hotShareWeb/public/statics/ && rm bundle*.js
